name: Waterfall - Drinking Game
description:
Looking for a fun and easy way to start a party? Want to get drunk and have a good time?
Then you've come to the right place!
Waterfall is a simple drinking game inspired by the infamous drinking game: Ring of Fire.
With the easy-to-understand guidelines and rules for each card you read along the way, it is an easy game to pick up even if you are unfamiliar with the concept.

Gameplay:
To play the game 2-10 players and a bunch of drinks are required. The cards are all placed in a circle overlapping each other. You take turns pulling a card. If the circle is broken you must finish your drink. There are many different version of the game. You can choose to follow your own rules or the ones we have provided. The rules for each card will appear if you click the info button underneath each card.

Disclaimer: Have a great time and do not get too drunk!
